replies.body:
damn those rewards
{{champion:516}}
What happens if I already own all the ultimate skins I want? (i dont want ez or udyr)
They perma ban you
You win them regardless, it's something for nothing. Why you gotta argue lmao
ikr

you prob get the skin shard
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
i would prefer this as i have 3 of skins already

Couldn't the prize be (for getting every single one CORRECT) choosing 3 FREE skins (like we get the codes to the skins we want or our account having given some priority).

Obviously excluding legacy skins, now that would be a worthy prize tbh.
your saying all 5 of the most expensive skins in game isnt as good as 3 skins of your choice?

What I'm saying is that not everyone wants those 5 skins. Yes they are the MOST expensive, but like not everyone wants that.

I would personally like Firecracker Jinx or Shockblade Zed rather than those 5 skins.

Plus, allowing us to choose freely among ALL (minus legacy) skins is better - ofc this is in my opinion.
i already have 3 of them and hate the other 2, id be down to pick 3, including legacy though.
tfw people think they will get the perfect pick and comment about the rewards. I think there is like 1 person if that every year who gets the perfect pick.  {{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}
hey for all we know if you do it You might even get the perfect pick O i Might even i'd say its based on luck but never doubt for the clout
but i already own 2 of them {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
i own all 5 you just get them in hextech crafting and you can disenchant for 3250 orange essence each
that's actually a fking scam wtf
what are the odds of getting ever pick right? like really{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Less than one percent.
{{champion:103}}
link comes up with 2017 worlds pickem
because this year's pickems have not opened up yet due to the play-ins not being complete. Check back on the 9th of October.
isn't it the 7th? or am I just confused
{{champion:17}}

I don't think riot cares what majority of the server thinks anyways :)
{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:12}} <- so i can escape
I would much prefer all the championship skins (possibly with the chromas and borders?) I think that would be a way cooler reward.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

remember when you would get championship riven for getting your pick em's 100% right? That made me want to do it. I don't care enough about skins that I could buy anyway. maybe something a little harder to come buy, like give them 30 gemstones or exclusive skins.
Riot are probably just afraid that a lot of people could potentially get all of them right, But don't forget that I think it was season 5 pick em, only 1 person got it.
